string.text: Information about stash
A combat trophy
Some dickhead has wasted almost half of our lot! He had a gun with frills... I should pick it up.
Geek's stash
One former expert is used to keeping things here... I should take a look some day.
Under the cross
Some guy couldn't think anything better than to bury some goodies under the cross by the bush.
A surgeon's backpack
Some dupe got wasted there. Have to check it out.
Shot-firer's tackle
Some gull hides his stuff here. They say he was a member of some demolition squad...
A drug crate
I must get more of that stuff! It does kick out!
Ezz's knapsack
There's some of my stuff here. Whoever dares to take it - I gonna work him over!
By the three cisterns
I stole some damn rare shit from the soldiery! I must hide it before I shoot up.
Backpack is in the porthole
When taking care of some goons yesterday, I spotted their stash. Need to empty it myself before anybody finds out...
Radioactive chest
I swindled some gudgeon out of artifacts. Better stash them before there's a shook up.
Gun crate
I got some shithead and he had a nice barrel on him...
Merc's box
Need to find out! That dude was supposed to contact me yesterday. Maybe he got wasted?
The bag on the support beam
Wow! Some asshole has got a grip of cool artifacts!
Trash bin
We've fucked some dupe! Man, he had nice stuff by him!
Safe under the tree
We've got a common stash with the lads for hunting - a fridge with vodka and snacks...
Things in the stash
That' a THING! Tough thing, damn it!
Radioactive pipe
Got some cool things recently! Enough to get myself a nice barrel...
The pile
A cool gun is always cool, heh!
Drugstore under the bush
Zmey has got a stash here with medicine and stuff...
Archive box
A dutier has kicked the bucket here. A good guy he was... Must tell his fellows to take the ammunition.
Under the trap door
Must hide some trophies so that no one knows...
Under the bush by the wall
Nice, nice... Some hunter's got a good safe! I must take a look.
Stolen box
How fortunate! Such box may be cashed in nicely!
Agrosafe
How did such a barrel happen here, I wonder? Ok, the most important thing is that it's mine now!
The body of the truck
Nice move! Some soldier hid his stuff into MY stash! I should check this gift of fortune...
Rotted log
WTF?! I had a damn warehouse there! Some bastards took out everything! I must find a new hiding place...
Govern's crate
Nice life some govern was living here... Was he a chechen, I wonder?..
Locksmith's inventory
Who were the workers here??? Before it was some govern with Salman Raduev's stuff, now - some locksmith with Bin Laden's tools...
Bandits' communal "fund"
Some footpads caught a dupe and tortured him, bastards. I should check out for his stuff...
Cop's garbage
The lads and I have wasted a louse here. I had the feeling he was a damn cop...
Bloodsucker's chest
I went for the stuff and saw... A shitting bloodsucker! A huge dunghill! Keeps stinking until now! Or was it not the bloodsucker to shit...
Mole's hole
Some oaf had plenty of things here...
Some dolt's stuff
Look, cats! I've wasted some dolt yesterday and there was a cool barrel by him! A real ack-ack gun, I tell you!
For a rainy day
The country is suffering inflation, nobody has got any idea of how it gonna be tomorrow. I ought to store up some goodies...
Chemist's stuff
There used to be an experienced stalker, who made repellent salve from pseudodogs' shit... Must've got wasted because of excessive knowledge, he-he...
Debris after a picnic
We've had a picnic with the guys yesterday. Too many drinks... Vasyok even got into some gutter "for a bath", idiot!
Lame's hide
Lame has got something from dutiers yesterday and hid it. I should check it out before he squanders it on drink.
Supplies in the bunker
Ammo of the Duty's security checkpoint is stored in a bunker, but nobody's keeping an eye on the chest.
Dutyer's stash
I saw how a dutyer stuck something in the pipe by the gate. Must be checked!
Goon's stash
Goon mentioned he had got a cool gun. Yesterday he got wasted by some motherfuckers... High time to check his hide.
Cool hide
Fixed some things for dutyers and got some nice stuff from them!
Swithboard with a secret stash
Some dutyer is fed up with service and is hiding stuff to take to his heels some day...
Sniper stash on the tower
Saw a Duty marksman hide something on the tower. It MUST be emptied! Things like that ain't happening every day...
Doctor's stash
Some dick, probably the Duty doctor, kept gadding about there yesterday. I'm sure to find something there.
Petro's hide
Got hit when robbing some dutyers, had to drop the stuff here...
A veteran's stash
Had a party with the dutyers yesterday... Man, I can't remember shit! But still managed to note the place I had put my things...
My store
That's it, growing little by little. A bit more, and I may leave this damn Zone forever!
Some mercs' stuff
When escaping the mercs I had robbed, had to drop down some stuff - too damn heavy to run with...
Explosive cache
Had a chat with guys from the demolition squad. Learned plenty of new things and stole some things as well... Life's hard!
Helping ecologists
Dropped by at Yantar recently... Those bastards just HAD to be helped with inventory, ha-ha!
Ammo crate
Hid some crap in a crate. Otherwise how do I survive without ammo and grenades?!
Dick's crap
That dick I've wasted yesterday had some strange armour on him! Seems to be nice, but also slightly radioactive...
Spy's secret hide
Saw some spy to disguise himself and infiltrate the Duty HQ... But his sharp tongue got him in such a mess in the bar!!! Better keep my mouth shut.
Train car above the bridge
How can one understand those soldiery commanders?! "Stand there! Come here!"... Got a cool barrel as a trophy and now they say to throw it away...
A perished stalker's things
I saw a stalker go down under an anomaly by the train tunnel in the woods. Seemed like he had some pretty good stuff.
The cross by the bandits' camp
The chest stolen by the bandits has been found in the cross by the bandit's camp. Need to prepare a detachment and get it.
Bandits' warehouse
It is impossible to supply everybody with everything! Because there's plenty of "everybody" and too little of "everything"...
Acid's cache
Got fed up of those assholes! Had to take to my heels and hide some stuff.
Shelter in the cellar
I should hide the gun until it is time to teach those fuckers a lesson!
Safe on the farm
I've been hiding stuff for a rainy day here. So plenty of it that I'm almost looking forward to it!
Anti-goon hide
So many damn goons around! I have to keep my eyes open and stuff ready...
Somebody's stuff
Lads mentioned some dick hanging about there. Maybe I should check out for anything interesting there...
Thug's cache
I must hide "something" before these bitches grab it. Or maybe waste them all!
Mercs' warehouse
Found a nice gun. Better hide it here for some time...
Cellar in the village
Found out from Lihoi that the secret stash is in the cellar. He was talking too much so we shut him up for good.
A good place
Went out for hunting... Had a good time!
Profiteer's stash
We seem to have found the profiteer who had been dealing with that asshole from the roadblock. Must get our ammo back and kick asses!
The valuables of the commander
The commander got drunk and started waving his gun all around. Had to knock him out and hide the barrel.
By a country road
Those oafs kept muttering about some hide with lots of crap...
The robbers' cellar
Hardly got out back to my guys from there. Found some barrel with no ammo on my way. I should get some rounds for it.
Gas pipe
Had to choke some prick to get back the debt... Ought to get for the stuff some day.
Lost crate
WTF?! Those rookie soldiers forgot to take an ammo crate from there!!! I'll kill'em!
Tower at the check-point
Arseholes keep coming here! Lots of them already! Is this a museum, fuckers?! I may run out of ammo if it keeps going like that...
Bandits' storage
My friend got robbed, damn it! I'll choke the morons!
Old crane
Holy shit! Just stripped some jerk of his stuff, some dutyers appeared! Had to hide everything.
Grizzly's things
Some shithead hired Grizzly to waste one guy... And equipped him with some nice things, really special!
Pipe on the North pile
Stowed the goodies away in a pipe at the garbage.
Stash in the scrap metal
Some strange shit happened there. Some man was lying there... Or a humanlike mutant? And a guitar nearby! X-files, damn it...
Iron furnace next to the cistern.
Made a profitable raid on an ammo warehouse. Was it of the Duty or the Army - I don't give a shit, but the stuff was good.
Pipe on the East pile
Wasted one oaf, who had sworn at my buddy... And he turned out to be a dutyer! Nice stuff they've got at the Duty, I tell you!
Nobody's backpack
I told Kolya-Brute: "Don't try to get there!" But would this idiot listen!..
The belongings of the murdered one
We've figured out that piece of shit that had been betraying our lads to the martinets! Some cool stuff he had, bastard!
Rotted stump
I've got a barrel to waste that scum! He's doomed! He and his fellow mercs!
Log in the forest
Lads say that guy is no longer alive. And I remember, where he used to keep stuff...
Storage of the Strelok faction
Strelok and his men are said to have got wasted... And they used to carry cool guns. Got some info about their hideout to check out.
Secret stash in the car
The Long One and I stumbled upon some martinet. Had to teach him a lesson - how to be polite and how to share goodies...
Stalker's backpack in the bus
Here was a reserve stock of those who helped Bes. No idea what happened to them...
Bathroom supplies
Those goons are crazy! Hiding stuff in the lavatory! The stink there nearly corrodes the gas mask! The only wise thing is - whoever approaches - dies.
Safe in the South pile.
Some dick used to loaf around selling medkits, kinda doctor. No medicine prevented us from shooting him down, ha-ha!
Storage in the scrap metal yard
Some really crazy dickhead he was! Made necklaces of mutants' tails, eyes, fangs and shit like that. Disgusting!
Supplies in the chest
Some motherfucker arranged for a barrel and stuff for himself. What does he need the silencer for? I better not go to meet him alone...
Pipe by the bus
I stuck the habar into the pipe at the garbage. It won't stay there for long.
Backpack in the ruins
They say some scientists perished there. I must have a look - they always have some cool things by them.
Chest at the roadblock
While the dutyers were shooting, I hid the habar in the wagon. Somehow I have to get in to pick it up.
Backpack of Weakling
They say that Weakling choked at the Garbage - need to drop by to check out the goods. Otherwise there'll be many interested parties coming in.
Drunkard's string bag
Robbers murdered the bum which used to ramble about and gather cans... I ought to check out - he could've found something really useful...
Under the dipper
One poor devil perished here - didn't notice an anomaly. Sorry for him. Must check his stuff, though.
Secret of concrete blocks
One smartass used to bum about here killng mutants. Don' know what the barrel he had, but a cool thing, for sure.
Sniper's stash in the log
The very moment I finished making a cover, this damn bloodsucker turned up! Had to make off quickly.
Stash in the furnace
Got in there in search for somthing interesting and decided to drop some of my stuff there.
Secret stash in KAMAZ
They say some cool guy drove that truck. Before he got choked...
Undertaker's treasure
I saw Undertaker find something right before a bloodsucker chased him down. Should take a look anyway...
Freedomer's hide
Saw some fool drop something there. And the fool is the one to guard the Freedom's warehouse...
Treasure in the tower
A wonderful place for a secret stash! Plenty of damn bloodsuckers there! The only problem for me is to get my things back...
Furnace secret stash
Man, that was a story to tell! Controller, bloodsuckers, mercs... Hardly got away!
Auto-secret stash
Was torturing a monolithian the other day... So, the fanatic kept screaming it was Bill Gates himself to drive that jalopy! Imagine that?!
Dangerous secret
Don't remember how I got there, but the place was almost glowing od radiation! How do I get my stuff back, I wonder...
Some oaf's stash
Saw some oaf slink there and back. I must take a look.
Backpack with equipment
What makes ya, bitches, keep coming to my hide?! Tonnes of ammo wasted on you!
Secret stash on a hill
Some gudgeon asked me to help him hide his stuff... Nice move! Big thanks, ha-ha!
Chest from the helicopter
Rumours are about mercs to have shot down that heli to get its cargo... Maybe something's left there...
Secret in the tombstone
I am taking my belongings with me. Whoever pokes his nose - I'll get you even from the other world!
Secret stump
Got a nice outfit at "Rostok". Better hide it for a rainy day.
Secret stash of the high altitude worker
That was a carouse yesterday! Found myself in the cabin of a crane all covered with puke! The devil knows how I had got in there...
The agreed-upon secret stash
Me and Hairy decided to set a raid against dutyers tomorrow. Hid the equipment in a wagon.
Stock in the log
Had to hide my habar from various jerks. So many of them nowadays! Time to start shooting them systematically!
Pipe with goods
I concealed some stuff in a pipe for those hard times to come...
Healing habar
They say, "Stealing is a sin!" But how does an ordinary lad survive in this cruel world?! Stole some goods, so what?
Goodies in the log
A nice log for a hide! Rest in piece, unknown soldier with cool outfit...
Explosive stash
What a nice stash I stumbled upon!!! Prey, you, bastards!
Backpack in the tunnel
Noticed some dope hang around that tunnel with anomalies. What was he doing there?..
Chest with goods
I know the exact place that barrel is hidden! I must pick it up before the owner comes for it.
Untidy's hide
Untidy mentioned that he had got something interesting from some hayseeds...
Stinky hide
I was passing by when smelled something. I thought that someone had choked nearby. But it was a chest!
Steel secret stash
Organized a hide in the hatch. I will need it when we start the operation against those fanatics.
Mysterious chest
Quite right they say: "A spiderman is only afraid of an insecticide-man!" Damn mutants! I gonna waste you all!!!
Trunk with goodies
Some habar got hidden there... I should set it free, ha-ha!
Strelok's habar
They say this stash belongs to Strelok himself! And that he dropped some stuff there before going to th NPP.
Veterans' habar
There was a time when the Scorcher was not yet operating. So, some seasoned stalkers made their way to Pripyat and back...
Monolith's gift
One of those fanatics has made a stash in the kindergarten. I must check it out there... and set some trip-wires.
Fang's habar
Fang's stuff was buried in Pripyat, beneath the monument.
Ammo stock
The martinets had a transshipment point there. And a stock of ammo, of course...
Murk's treasure
The cross is on the way to the scorcher, didn't go any further, hid everything there under it.
Goodies of the dead stalker
Some stalker perished here, and his goodies are still lying around... Sorry for the lad! He could become an astronaut, you know!
Just a safe
Lads and me once went to the forest (had to bury one dope). And I noticed some safe there.
Package for Duty
Only a damn fool could decide to fly that course! To hell with him, I must check the place of crash for goodies.
Supplies of Danila's group
When nobody even dreamed of infiltrating through the Radar, Danila and his group were searching for ways to Pripyat. Some say Strelok was with them...
Goodies of the leader of former faction
Lads!!! They say that the leader of some former faction croaked here! We must hurry and check, before some arseholes grab the stuff!!!
Pharmacist's hide
Rumours say about some former pharmacist hanging around there. Who killed him, I wonder... Maybe some unsatisfied customers, ha-ha!
Secret stash under the cross
Nice stuff that dope had by him, may he rest in peace...
Chest under the small house
So nice stuff here and just nobody around to say thanks to, he-he...
Knucklehead's backpack
Only a perfect fool could hide his stuff by simply putting it under some stairs!
Stash behind the tree
I have to drop some of my things here. I'll pick them up after I deal with that shithead...
Medkit in the garage
I must not forget about it and hide it somewhere else before somebody grabs it.
An ecologist's grave
Saw some mercenaries murder an ecologist the other day... I'll avenge his death!
Backpack with equipment
Don't remember shit about it... But I marked it down, so it's sure to be nice...
Chest in a safe spot
Nice gun in there, I saw Vasya Rhino hid it there myself. Should take care of the barrel before it gets rusty...
Stash under the roof
God knows how to get there! But I do have to. Urgently!
Safe in the house
Cool stuff here, indeed! Who put it here, I wonder?..
Set free hide
Some strange name for a stash. Better check it out...
Armani's habar
Why do they always have better stuff?! Bastards! I must help myself with everything!
Clubs stash
Kill them all! Take everything! We've been born for war!
Concrete treasure
Must'a hide the gun. Uncle Sam's gift, ya know...
Pasha Locomotive's stuff
Some gull turned up here, fucking lads' brains... Finally, he slipped on a banana pile and fell right on a knife blade... Three or four times in a row...
A stash at the construction site
Such cool shit here! Can't be that goobacks brought it here!
Vovan's stash
Vovan went off for a piss and remained there. Too busy with something, I guess...
A chest with medicine
In the critical situation to have arisen, it would be crucial to assign the existing resources so as to gain maximum efficiency and successfully overcome the diarrhea.
Chest in the crane
Elk arranged a stash for himself there. He thought he was clever, ha-ha! Got right into an \"Electro\"! It was like those fireworks on the New Year's day!
Strange hatch
The devil knows who this guy is, who keeps putting stuff here. I tell you, world psychiatry would gain a lot if they study him!
Guard's equipment
Some scientists passed here on an expedition. The mercenaries wasted both them and their guards...
Small chest under the roof
Now it's time to say hi to mercs! They've become too insolent lately...
A larded pipe
A cool idea, folks! Let's rob this hide, there's a damn good gun there!
Zombie's secret
Aaaaaa!!! Khhhrushhhh!!! Khhhilll!!! Ssssslayyy!!!
Indian's backpack
This goon wil have to work a lot - he ordered plenty of equipment. If only he tries to trick me - I'll kill him, I swear!
Secret stash under the cross
How much did we drink yesterday, I wonder... Feeling SO bad today... Sick... Had to drop some goodies here...
A log with a trap
Had to hide a part of my belongings. Placed a trap there. Whoever tries to poke his nose is sure to lose it.
Backpack under the bridge
Stuck the backpack under the bridge. Let it stay there until I get back.
Car with the secret stash
Lucky me! Got something special from a gull in the Bar. I'll pick it up on my way back.
A weed stump
Shared some weed with a dope. He got so high that started giving out his stuff! A dope is a dope forever!
Habar from a drugstore
My companion and me came across an abandoned drugstore with a storage in the basement. Did some inventory there...
Some dope's hide
Saw some dopey dutyer hide something in a pipe. He thinks himself clever... We'll empty his stash in no time!
Pine tree flavour backpack
Was getting high with some acid head and he started shouting: "Look! Backpack's growing on the pine tree!" Stupid! But I'd better check...
Government chest
One guy stole some crate from a military warehouse. He said it had been very heavy... Sure thing he got choked! One must keep his mouth shut about such things...
Chest
Poker, damn him, keeps taking things from lads of the lot! He won't get anything from me, though, my stash is damn good.
Hatch for sewage
I'll keep my stuff here until I'm back from vacation. I hope it's safe...
Stalker's backpack
Threw the backpack under a tree. Otherwise, I wouldn't have escaped the bandits.
Robbed gudgeon's habar
Ha-ha-ha! That was fun! Some dick wanted to do number one and I promised to look after his stuff. He even gave me some money in advance!!! Gudgeon!
Hidden safe
Everybody says Borov is a cool cat. I don't care! I've been snitching goodies from him and will keep it that way on!
Warehouse in wagon
Some equipment has been placed here for our sniper. He is to eliminate a number of very dangerous criminals.
Doublet's stash
Fucking Barkeep sent me to this damn lab! I must drop down some stuff to reduce weight. The devil knows what kind of tricks are there.
Chest with goods
We've croaked a boy the other day... Jesus! So many cool things he had by him!
Butcher's secret
There used to be a guy who kept cutting off mutants' tails, ears and all. Said he had an order placed for that. Bullshit! He was crazy, I'm sure!
Stash in the switchboard
Some jerk had got a barrel and thought himself cool. A little bashing up proved he was neither cool nor alive, he-he...
Chest for Vasya
I've placed the necessary stuff for Vasya in the chest, just the way we had agreed. A hard work he's got! But there will be several goons less in this world.
Our rookie's backpack
Lads and I played a joke on our rookie - we hid his backpack. All of us lay out laughing as he still keeps searchig for it!
My equipment
Hardly managed to get out of that slaughterhouse. Had to drop down the add-ons, but the habar was woth it. I'll get the stuff back some day.
Safe at the gas station
Found a safe at the gas station and hid my goods in it. Seems like nobody ever goes there. I should find out why...
Chest on the cistern
Dragged the chest on the cistern. Please, Jesus, let nobody find it!..
Desperados hide
That was a deal! Banderas came for some artifacts right to our place!!! But he refused some thug of an autograph and got his head smashed with a bottle...
Trappers' hide
Nice hunting it was, I tell you! No more boars there! We should take the bag to Ansor for him to cook it... Meat pie! Mmm...
Nice stash
I've arranged a deal with some sergeant at the checkpoint - 500 for all. That's what I call a lucky day!
Abandoned habar
Some soldier left his habar here... Maybe he thought everybody was honest here? Ha-ha!
Borov's hide
Used to put stuff in a safe - some motherfuckers pilfered almost everything! Cannot trust anyone! Robbers and goons everywhere!
Backpack in a secret place
Assisted one moron yesterday. I was passing by and heard screams: "Help! I'm getting killed!" Went there and helped... Killed him. Nice, right?
Nondescript chest
Just imagine! I've discovered the dick to have stolen my raincoat! I don't remember giving a beat like THAT ever before!
Hidden habar
Hid the backpack under the car, nobody will bother looking there. At least I hope so.
Lost stuff
Decided to take a leak today... How would I know there was a pseudodog sleeping there?! And I pissed on it! Almost had my dick bitten off! And the stuff remained there...
Goodies in the electrical outlets
A scout of ours climbed there, but his last words were "Crushhh!!!" and "Klll!!!"
Ghost's stuff
The rumours are that Ghost managed to get inside. But he got in such a mess there! They say he finally died right by the exit...
Secret stash of Smoked
Smoked obviously got high before the raid. When he got inside he started shouting: "Drums are flying! Crates keep hitting me!" Damn acid head! I'll cut his nose off!
The pissed on backpack
What kind'a morons around! As soon as the fight started, two guys wet their pants... And my backpack!!! Had to drop it down - too stinky...
Cache of Expedition-2
After the anomalous activity has increased, had to arrange a storage for samples and equipment.
Old safe
Fine stash if not for one thing: plenty of snorks there! Wait until I get a grenade launcher...
Pipe with goods
I'm going to the lab now and will take the stuff on my way back. Nice things! Cool!
Backpack behind the garages
What's this place? Mutants all around! Damn them...
Backpack with the loot
We were just about to take the stuff when those jerks turned up... Hardly managed outta there!
A bus with habar
Swindled an egghead of money and he paid with habar! And an excellent one! We must pay a visit to him again, folks!
The loot in the car
Hell knows who drove it here, but their intentions obviously had nothing to do with peace and love...
Old backpack
They say there's somebody's goodies there, but they can't get to it because of the radiation.
Secret stash of a grouping
One dude mentioned about this place, said there was a gun or something. Must check it out...
Backpack of the tester
They say a military stalker went there and almost made it, but got croaked. Bullshit! No one can stand the psi-emission there!
Cache of Expedition-1
Those foureyes from laboratory found something really special there. But the snorks wouldn't let them have it...
Stash of the scientist
They say a scientist died there with some interesting things by him. I should try to get there...
Experimentalist's hide
Vitya Tie said that some ecologist had kicked the bucket there. And that smartass had studied artifacts... I plan to go there some day.
Assistant's stash
Some assistant was performing tests when something came out and swallowed him! Nothing left of him, but the outfit!
Thompson's habar

A strange zombie dwells at Yantar. They say he used to be a scientist, or something. The point is that zombies keep bringing him artifacts! I must be the first to grab the stuff once the emission disappears! Still don't know the way, but the pipe seems to be of help.
